channel.title: My server Name
channel.description: Well yes Someone is copying my server name and there miss leading my players from my server so dose anyone have an idea how to fix that i know its not about server file help but yea...

item.title: My server Name
item.dc:creator: @pimpownage pimpownage
item.description:
@pimpownage wrote:

or you could advertise your server on the status page as “the real “name here”” but i duno might be weird lol

Read full topic

item.title: My server Name
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“Envion, post:5, topic:155520”]Unless you can provide tangible evidence that the name is in fact yours, and that you are the sole and original creator… you’re out of luck. It’s your word against his, and neither of you have really any more credibility than the other.[/quote]well i think its originally his name because ive been playing on his server ever since it started and that a long time

Read full topic

item.title: My server Name

item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

Envion:

Unless you can provide tangible evidence that the name is in fact yours, and that you are the sole and original creator… you’re out of luck. It’s your word against his, and neither of you have really any more credibility than the other.

Well thanks much appreciated

item.title: My server Name
item.dc:creator: @xdarklight.x xdarklight.x
item.description:
@xdarklight.x wrote:

[quote=“Play For Keeps, post:3, topic:155520”]You can
a)Report them to Moparscape.
b)Change your server name
c)ask the other person to change their server name by logging onto their server

You pick.[/quote]

a)Report them to Moparscape. " For what reason they arnt breaking a rule
b)Change your server name “Ugh… I had a Good Name”
c)ask the other person to change their server name by logging onto their server “Did and they called me a Noob and To Fck Off; Followed by a Ban”

More help…?

Read full topic
